name: australian-open-data-publishers
title: Australian Open Data Publishers
description: Organisations across Australia that publish open data.

resources.name: Australian Open Data Publishers
resources.description: Organisations across Australia that publish open data. Includes Organisation name, URL, Organisation type, Portal type, Region, Latitude, Longitude.

fields.name: Organisation
fields.title: Organisation
fields.description: The name of an Australia organisation that is publishing open data

fields.name: URL
fields.description: The web address of the organisations open data portal

fields.name: Portal
fields.description: The technology platform that underlies the open data portal, if known

fields.name: Region
fields.description: The geographic coverage of the open data portal
